description: A sleek, opinionated UI kit built with Tailwind CSS and Alpine.js. 59 copy-paste components with a single config file for theme control.
rules: All Marrow UI component classes use the 'mw-' prefix (e.g., mw-btn, mw-card, mw-input)
Interactive components require Alpine.js x-data attributes with registered data components (e.g., x-data="mwDialog()")
Styling is done via Tailwind CSS utility classes combined with mw-* component classes
Theme customization is done via marrow.config.js â€” do not edit generated CSS files directly
Button variants: mw-btn-primary, mw-btn-secondary, mw-btn-outline, mw-btn-ghost, mw-btn-destructive, mw-btn-link
Button sizes: mw-btn-sm (small), default, mw-btn-lg (large), mw-btn-icon (square icon button)
Form inputs use: mw-input, mw-textarea, mw-select, mw-label, mw-checkbox, mw-radio, mw-switch
Modals use Alpine.js data components: mwDialog(), mwSheet(), mwAlertDialog(), mwDrawer()
State is communicated via data-state attributes: 'checked'/'unchecked' for checkboxes/switches, 'active' for tabs, 'on' for toggles
Toast notifications use Alpine.store('toasts').add({ title, description, variant, duration })
CSS custom properties are available for custom styling: --marrow-primary, --marrow-radius, --marrow-duration, etc.
Include marrow.js BEFORE Alpine.js in the HTML <head> to register all data components
